Uses of Interface
atlantis.framework.IUpdateable

  • Packages that use IUpdateable 
    Package Description
    atlantis.engine  
    atlantis.engine.input  
    atlantis.engine.state  
    atlantis.framework  

    • Uses of IUpdateable in atlantis.engine

      Classes in atlantis.engine that implement IUpdateable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameApplet
      Provide basic initialization of an applet
      class  GameApplication
      AtlantisEngine is the bootstrap class that create the game and prepare all objects used for the game
      class  Timer
      A timer class

    • Uses of IUpdateable in atlantis.engine.input

      Classes in atlantis.engine.input that implement IUpdateable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyboardComponent
      A keyboard component that be used with KeyboardHelper to provide some interesting keyboars states as pressed, justPressed, etc.
      class  MouseComponent 

    • Uses of IUpdateable in atlantis.engine.state

      Classes in atlantis.engine.state that implement IUpdateable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  State
      A class that define a game state.
      class  StateManager
      A State manager that is responsible to manage game states.

    • Uses of IUpdateable in atlantis.framework

      Classes in atlantis.framework that implement IUpdateable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DrawableGameComponent
      A DrawableGameComponent is a GameComponent that is updated and drawn on each frame.
      class  Game
      The Game class provide basic initialization and game logic.
      class  GameComponent
      A GameComponent is a component that is updated on each frame.
      class  GameComponentCollection
      A GameComponentCollection is a container of GameComponent (and DrawableGameComponent) that is updated and drawn on each frame
